```{r, echo=FALSE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
library(dplyr)
week_stats <- readRDS("/Users/noahknoblauch/Baseball/week_stats.RDS")
week_one <- week_stats[[1]] %>% ungroup() %>%
  select(-week)

```

```{r, echo=FALSE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
datatable(week_one,rownames = FALSE)
```
